00020 #ifndef NETWORK_UDPSOCKET_H
00021 #define NETWORK_UDPSOCKET_H
00022 
00023 #include <rdkcore/network/netexception.h>
00024 #include <rdkcore/network/inetaddress.h>
00025 
00026 #define UDP_SOCKET_DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE 1500
00027 
00028 namespace Network {
00029 
00030 class UDPSocket {
00031     // Constructors
00032     public:
00033         UDPSocket() throw();
00034         UDPSocket(unsigned short port) throw (UDPException, NetException);
00035         UDPSocket(const InetAddress& address) throw (UDPException);
00036     
00037         ~UDPSocket();
00038     // Interface
00039     public:
00040         // Return true if socket is opened
00041         bool isBound() throw();
00042         
00043         enum ShutdownType { READ = SHUT_RD, WRITE = SHUT_WR, ALL = SHUT_RDWR };
00044         bool shutdown( ShutdownType  how );
00045         
00046         // Close the socket
00047         void unbind() throw();
00048         
00049         // Open ( if needed close the socket before ) on the last address
00050         void rebind() throw( UDPException );
00051         
00052         // Bind on a new port
00053         void bind( unsigned short port ) throw( UDPException, NetException );
00054 
00055         // Bind on a specified address
00056         void bind( const InetAddress& address ) throw( UDPException );
00057         
00058         // Change buffer size
00059         void newBuffer( unsigned short buffersize ) throw();
00060         
00061         int getRealAddress( InetAddress& addr ) throw() {
00062             socklen_t size = sizeof( struct sockaddr );
00063             return ::getsockname( socket, (struct sockaddr*)&addr.getAddress(), &size);
00064         }
00065 
00066         inline InetAddress getAddress() { return address; }
00067         
00068         inline int getSocket() const {return socket;}
00069         
00070         // Send a RAW packet
00071         unsigned short send( const std::string& data, const InetAddress& address ) throw ( UDPException );
00072 
00073         // Receive a RAW packet, and store the address in address
00074         unsigned short recv( std::string& data, InetAddress& address, double timeoutSecs = 0.0) throw ( UDPException );
00075 
00076         // Receive a packet without storing the address
00077         inline unsigned short recv(std::string& data) throw (UDPException) { InetAddress ia; return recv(data, ia); }
00078     protected:
00079         unsigned short buffersize;
00080         InetAddress address;
00081         int socket;
00082         char* buffer;
00083 };
00084 
00085 }
00086 
00087 #endif
